/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades a testament to the architectural diversity of the city. Amidst the concrete jungle, patches of greenery peek through, offering a hint of nature amidst the urban sprawl. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene.
